name: Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II
desc: This Canon sits right in the sweet spot for price, features, and image quality. The G7 X captures detailed images thanks to a big 1-inch sensor, and it comes with optical image stabilization and 4.2X zoom. The tilting touchscreen and built-in Wi-Fi increase its utility.

name: Olympus Tough TG-6
desc: Olympus is known for its great mirrorless cameras, but it also makes incredible, nigh-indestructible point-and-shoots. Though it has a small sensor, this pocketable juggernaut can dive up to 50 feet underwater, brave sub-zero climates, and survive minor drops and spills without flinching.

name: Panasonic Lumix ZS100
desc: If you want to get up close and personal, Panasonic's compact Lumix ZS100 gives you way more zoom than the competition. Rather than 3X or 4X optical zoom, this camera has a lens that can go up to 10X.

name: Sony Cyber-shot RX100
desc: Need the basics? This tried-and-true Sony model, though several years old, is still a gem—especially since the price keeps dipping every time Sony releases newer versions.

name: Wireless HD Security Camera (Blink Indoor Security)
desc: Blink Indoor cameras are a simple and easy option for video recording your safe space. This wireless HD security camera is roughly 7 x 7cm. That makes it small enough to go unnoticed in the right place.

name: Arlo Pro 4
desc: The Arlo Pro 4 is an award-winning camera for home security. Thanks to its size and slim nature, it doubles as one of the best-hidden cameras on the market. The Arlo Pro 4 comes in black and white options. So you can choose which works best for your environment.

name: Wyze Cam v3
desc: The Wyze Cam v3 takes the top of our list for best-hidden cameras. That’s due to its abilities, size, and, most importantly, its price. It is a roughly 6 x 6 cm camera and looks small and unassuming. It is not as naturally disguised as others on this list. But you can disguise it similarly to other spy cameras.

name: Hikvision DS-2CE16D0T-IP ECO
desc: HikvisionThe Hikvision DS-2CE56C0T-IRPF HD 720p Indoor IR Turret Camera has 1MP Camera that sits in the turret position. It uses the Smart IR technology that allows it to see up to 20 meter distance.

name: Hikvision DS-2CE56C0T-IRPF
desc: Hikvision DS-2CE16D0T-IP ECO 2MP Bullet CC Camera comes with 2 MP high-performance Plastic Body,CMOS,OSD menu, DNR, DWDR, True Day/Night, Smart IR,Analog HD output, 20m IR distance,up the coax(HIKVISION-C), IP66.

name: Dahua HAC-HFW1000RP
desc: The Dahua HAC-HFW1000RP 1MP bullet camera With HDCVI, you can watch full HD video at 1080p while also utilizing existing cable infrastructure.
